sentence: The image is a screenshot of a blog page titled "Aris Blog."
sentence_cn: 该图是标题为“Aris Blog”的博客页面的截图。

sentence: The top banner features an illustration of a child sleeping on a crescent moon, wearing a red outfit with white polka dots and a matching headband, set against a dark blue starry sky.
sentence_cn: 顶部横幅描绘了一个孩子睡在新月上的图画，孩子穿着带有白色圆点的红色衣服，戴着同色头带，背景是深蓝色的星空。

sentence: The words "Aris Blog" are displayed in large red letters.
sentence_cn: “Aris Blog”字样以大红色字母显示。

sentence: Below the banner, there are two navigation tabs labeled "Home page" and "Take Me With You!"
sentence_cn: 横幅下方有两个导航标签，分别标记为“主页”和“带我一起去！”

sentence: The first blog post is dated "lunedÃ¬ 11 maggio 2015" (Monday, May 11, 2015) with the title "Circus bike queen."
sentence_cn: 第一篇博客文章的发布日期为“2015 年 5 月 11 日星期一”，标题为“马戏团自行车女王”。

sentence: The post features an illustration of a person with short hair wearing a red crown, circled by a blue-green ring and surrounded by newspaper cuttings.
sentence_cn: 帖子中的插图是一位短发男子，头戴红色皇冠，皇冠周围有一圈蓝绿色的圆环，周围还堆满了剪报。

sentence: On the right side, there's a notice in English requesting users not to use the blog's pictures without permission, along with a contact email.
sentence_cn: 右侧有英文通知，请求用户不得未经许可使用博客图片，并附有联系电子邮件。

sentence: Below the notice is a thumbnail image labeled "Calendario 2015," displaying a bear sitting on a crescent moon in a starry night sky.
sentence_cn: 通知下方是一张标有“2015 年日历”的缩略图，图中是一只熊坐在繁星点点的夜空中的一弯新月上。
